title: Mayor Bruce Harrell announces Seattle Park District budget proposal
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy
Mayor Bruce Harrell announces his plan to invest approximately $115 million per year toward ensuring Seattle’s nearly 500 parks, playfields, and community centers remain welcoming areas for recreation, learning, and healthy communities. Mayor Harrell’s budget prioritizes core maintenance needs while making critical investments toward safety, climate action, youth opportunities, and equity.

Speakers include:
Mayor Bruce Harrell, City of Seattle
Councilmember Andrew J. Lewis, Seattle City Council
Christopher Williams, Seattle Parks and Recreation
Marlon Herrera, Board of Parks and Recreation Commissioners
Jenea Bradford, Seattle Parks and Recreation Youth at Work summer intern
